snippet: Tied to the Summer Olympics, the new campaign is an extension of a celebration of mothers that began with the Vancouver Olympics in 2010.
abstract: Tanzina Vega Advertising column highlights campaign by Procter & Gamble tied to the Summer Olympics, an extension of a celebration of mothers that began with the Vancouver Olympics in 2010.
lead_paragraph: Tied to the Summer Olympics, the new campaign is an extension of a celebration of mothers that began with the Vancouver Olympics in 2010.

headline.seo: Mothers Get the Glory in Procter & Gamble Campaign
headline.main: Mothers Will Get the Glory in P.&G.’s Campaign
headline.print_headline: Mothers Will Get the Glory In P.&G.’s Campaign
